item.description:
We'll gather on Gloria's deck around 3:00 for some swimming.  A little later, we'll grill some food, and if it gets too buggy, head inside for a planning meeting to put some things on our social calendar for the fall months.

Bring your swimsuit and a towel, and something to share for the potluck picnic dinner.

And of course, your ideas for club activities in the next couple of months.

Rain date will be the next day.

Because this is in a private home, you must RSVP in order to get an address and directions.
item.name: Pool party (and a short meeting)
